query:
SELECT 
  wl.id,
  wl.code,
  wl.status,
  COALESCE(SUM(i.quantity), 0) as total_quantity
FROM warehouseLocations wl
LEFT JOIN inventory i ON i.locationId = wl.id
GROUP BY wl.id, wl.code, wl.status
ORDER BY wl.code;
